name: Aaattack
description: Aaattack!!!! Build and customize a deck of magical runes to fight your foes and send the monsters back to the Underabyss! Imagine if MTG and Slay the Spire had a love child that loved fast matches and endless customization. Conquer the land of Tardania by defeating the evil monsters that have taken over the lands. Restore the world to its former glory!!!
